S08abhnispu:2: jyotibhir vijitaṃ yad asya jagatīṃ jiṣṇv antaratvatamo (?)
S08abhnispu:3: yac cādvaitadaśārṇasaty api parīṇāmo guṇaughaḥ śriyām /
S08abhnispu:6: tair etac caritādbhutāni nijadhīdhāmāni dhāvantu vaḥ //
S08abhnispu:8: tadañcitais tadvacanirmitaughair amogham agryāṃ śriyam ādadhātu //
S08abhnispu:9: iha hi mṛdumadhyakramābhyāṃ subhāvitasamādher adhimātraprajñasya bhagavatā /
S08abhnispu:12: sa hi tvāṃ sarvasattvāṃś ca vajradharatvaṃ prāpayitum abhyutsāhavān skandhadhātvāyatanādikaṃ pratibimbamayaṃ śūnyataikarasaṃ niścinvan /
S08abhnispu:15: dharmadeśanādibhir yathābhavyaṃ parahitāni kurvāṇaḥ parapuṇyāvadhiṃ sthāpayan saṃharaṃś cācintya mūrtir udeti //
S08abhnispu:17: ārasātalam abhimataprasarā ghanaikasārā jvalantī vajramayī bhūmiḥ kalpāntajvalanavanamayūkhajvālāvalīsīmābandhā /
S08abhnispu:20: tatra pūrvasyām ārāyāṃ yamāntakaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ sitaraktamukhaḥ kṛṣṇavajramudgarakhaḍgamaṇikamaladhārī /
S08abhnispu:31: tatroṣṇīṣaṭakkyacalasumbhā ratnamukuṭino vicitraratnābharaṇā lalitā īṣaddarśitadaṃṣṭrā vigataśmaśravaḥ /
S08abhnispu:32: tadanye vikṛtarūpāḥ sabhrūbhaṅgāḥ piṅgordhvakeśabhrūśmaśravo vyāvṛttadaṃṣṭrākarālavaktrā lalajjihvā aṭṭāṭṭahāsinaḥ krūrāṣṭanāgabhūṣanā vāmanāḥ pīnās tundilāḥ /
S08abhnispu:33_0: daśāpy ete sahāsanair niścalāḥ pratyālīḍhenārāgreṣv īṣadalagnaviśvābjasūryasthāḥ
S08abhnispu:33_2: aparimitātmakamūrtinirmāṇaiś ca niravadhidhātutrayeṣu vighnaugham akhilam asakṛnnirmūlayantaḥ /
S08abhnispu:35: mukhaṃ tu mūlaṃ śariravarṇaṃ savyavāmaṃ ca yathoktavarṇaṃ pratimukhaṃ raktavartulanetratrayam //
S08abhnispu:37_0: cakraṃ cātibhramaṇān niścalopamaṃ nirantaraṃ sphurad anekajvālākalāpaṃ tasya nābhyantare
S08abhnispu:37_2: viśvakuliśasahitā tadvajrasya digārā yathāyogaṃ vairocanādisamavarṇā vedī ca /
S08abhnispu:39_0: tasya madhye bhagavān vajrasattvo mañjuvajrarūpaḥ kuṅkumāruṇaḥ kṛṣṇasitasavyetaravadanaḥ
S08abhnispu:40: tasya pūrvasyāṃ diśi vairocanaḥ sitaḥ kṛṣṇaraktasavyetaramukhaḥ sitāṣṭāracakrāsimaṇikamaladharaḥ /
S08abhnispu:44: trayo 'mī kṛṣṇasitasavyetaravaktrāḥ sarve tathāgatā ratnamukuṭino vicitraratnābharaṇāḥ /
S08abhnispu:47: māmakī akṣobhyasamā raktotpalāsimaṇipadmadharā sarvasādhaneṣu tathā pāṭhāt /
S08abhnispu:50: ato garbhapuṭād bahir āgneyakoṇe rūpavajrā vairocanasadṛśī ratnadarpaṇāsimaṇyabjadharā /
S08abhnispu:61: atra mañjuvajravairocanadaśadevyaś candreṣu vajraparyaṅkiṇo 'nye sūryeṣu candrasūryataleṣu viśvapadmāni /
S08abhnispu:62: tathāgatāḥ pradhānabhujābhyāṃ svābhaprajñāliṅgitā devyas tu svābham upāyam //
S08abhnispu:71: iha mañjuvajrasya stanāntare samayasattvasadṛśaṃ jñānasattvaṃ taddhṛccandre khaḍgamuṣṭicandrasthaṃ maṃbījam /
S08abhnispu:72: śāśvataratneśāmitābhāmoghasiddhyakṣobhyānāṃ hṛdi cihne yathāyogaṃ candre sūrye vā vuṃ āṃ jrīṃ khaṃ hūṃ /
S08abhnispu:73: locanādidevīnāṃ Ioṃ māṃ pāṃ tāṃ jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ khaṃ raṃ /
S08abhnispu:77: iha niṣpannayoginaś cakṣurādyadhiṣṭhānaṃ jñānasattvapraveśādikaṃ ca noktam //
S08abhnispu:78: tadantareṇāpy aparimitācintyacakṣurabhijñādiguṇagrāmaramaṇīyamūrter abhīṣṭadevatāyāḥ sakṛd eva supariśuddhasarvākārapariniṣpatter muhur muhur adhimokṣadārḍhyāt /
S08abhnispu:80: yadā tu madhye 'nyas tathāgato bhavati nāyakas tadā madhyasthitas tasya sthāne tiṣṭhet /
S08abhnispu:81: amitābhaḥ śubhro 'pi bhavati śuklā dharmāḥ prakṛtyeti vāgīśasyātra śuklatety ukteḥ //
S08abhnispu:82: iha vakṣyamāneṣu ca mandaleṣu yasyā māṇḍaleyadevatāyā mukhyato yatsthānam ucyate tasmin saiva pradhānatayā maṇḍaleśabhimukhī /
S08abhnispu:84: atra kūṭāgārasya vajrabhūmyādiparito vajrapañjaraṃ rakṣācakraṃ dharmodayā ceti trayaḥ parikarāḥ /
S08abhnispu:85: tatra vajrapañjaraṃ vakṣyamānānām api sarveṣāṃ kūṭāgārāṇāṃ rakṣācakraṃ (Am 232)
S08abhnispu:87: lekhyakūṭāgārāṇāṃ tu dharmadhātusvarūpadharmodayāyā dharmadhātvantargatasya vā sūcakaṃ likhanam uktaṃ vajrāvalyām //
S08abhnispu:88: yathā bāhyaṃ tathādhyātmam ity utpannakramamaṇḍalapratipādanākṛtena lokadhātoś cakravāḍasūcakaṃ vajrāvalīlikhanaṃ ca niyamenaiva /
S08abhnispu:91: api ca śūnyataiva bhagavatī nikhilavighnaughaṃ samūlam unmūlayituṃ prabhavatīti tadadhimokṣadṛḍhatvam evādarotpādanāya rakṣācakralikhanaṃ na varṇitaṃ lekhyamaṇḍaleṣu /
S08abhnispu:92: bhāvyamaṇḍaleṣu tu kvacid eva tadbhāvanoktā na sarveṣu /
S08abhnispu:93: vighnaghātānantaraṃ śūnyatāpraveśād bhāvyamaṇḍale 'pi rakṣācakraṃ nāsty ato na likhyate caitat /
S08abhnispu:94: evaṃ tarhi vajraprākāram api cakravāḍasūcakaṃ na likhitavyam /
S08abhnispu:97: nahi bhagavatā vajraprākārasya dvitīyavārotpattiḥ kvacid uktā //
S08abhnispu:99: sakṛd utpannam eva hi vajrabhūbandhaprākārādikaṃ samastasamāropaśūnyatāsvabhāvaṃ māyāmayam avatiṣṭhata eva /
S08abhnispu:101: kaiścit tu kvacid rakṣācakram api likhituṃ saṃmanyate //
